The Importance Of Wudu: The Prophet Muhammad s said: “Salah (prayer) of
anyone of you who has invalidated his/her purification
is not accepted unless he/she makes wudu’’. (Bukhari)
The Virtues Of Wudu’: The Prophet Muhammad s said: “When the Muslim
or believing servant performs ablution and washes
his/her face, each sin he/she has committed by his/ her eyes washes away with the water. When he/she
washes his/her hands, each sin his/her hands have
committed washes away with the water – or with the
last drop of water until he/she becomes free of sin.”

Before Doing Wudu’.1: Go to the toilet first (if required). You should use the toilet and then wash the private parts before performing wudu’.
Before Doing Wudu’.2: It is good practice to clean the teeth with siwak (toothstick) or a toothbrush before performing wudu’ as taught by the Prophet Muhammad s.
Before Doing Wudu’.3: Before starting the actions of wudu’, it is necessary to make your intention of washing to be for the purpose of wudu’ only.

Rules: The following actions nullify the Wudu - i.e. it has
to be performed again in order to pray. These are in
regards to both men and women:
4.  Flowing of blood or pus from any part of the body.
5.  Deep sleep, whereby one loses awareness.
7.  Touching the private parts with the hand and fingers

THE FOLLOWING STEPS MUST BE OBSERVED IN.Step 1 - Bismillah: First, make the Niyyah (intention) in your heart that this act of Wudu is for the purpose of preparing for Salah, and say: “Bismillah” (in the name of Allah).
THE FOLLOWING STEPS MUST BE OBSERVED IN.Step 2 - Hands: Wash both hands up to the wrists (starting with the right hand) three times, making sure that water has reached between the fingers.
THE FOLLOWING STEPS MUST BE OBSERVED IN.Step 3 - Mouth: Take water with your right hand, put it into your mouth and rinse thoroughly three times.
THE FOLLOWING STEPS MUST BE OBSERVED IN.Step 4 - Nose: Take water with your right hand, splash it into your nose and blow it out three times. (Use the left hand if necessary to help blow it out).
THE FOLLOWING STEPS MUST BE OBSERVED IN.Step 5 - Face: Wash your whole face three times repeatedly. (The whole face includes: the right ear to the left ear, and the forehead to the bottom of the chin).
THE FOLLOWING STEPS MUST BE OBSERVED IN.Step 6 - Arms: Wash the right arm thoroughly from wrist to elbow three times, and make sure that no part of the arm has been left unwashed.  Repeat with the left arm.
THE FOLLOWING STEPS MUST BE OBSERVED IN.Step 7 - Head: Move the palms of the wet hands lightly over the head, starting from the top of the forehead to the back of the head, and passing both hands over the back of the head to the neck, and then bringing them back to the forehead.
THE FOLLOWING STEPS MUST BE OBSERVED IN.Step 8 – Ears: With the same water, rub the grooves and holes of both ears with the wet index fingers, while also passing the wet thumbs behind the ears from the bottom upward.
THE FOLLOWING STEPS MUST BE OBSERVED IN.Step 9 – Feet: Finally, wash both feet to the ankles three times, starting with the right foot.  Make sure that water has reached between the toes and covered the rest of the foot.
